name: DeleteFileRequest
description:
Permanently delete a specific file request.

Use this tool to permanently delete a file request by its ID.

parameters.name: file_request_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID representing a file request, extracted from the URL in the file request builder.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a file request.

The ID for any file request can be determined
by visiting a file request builder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/filerequest/123`
the `file_request_id` is `123`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: file_request_id
parameters.description:
The unique identifier that represent a file request.

The ID for any file request can be determined
by visiting a file request builder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/filerequest/123`
the `file_request_id` is `123`.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a file request.

The ID for any file request can be determined
by visiting a file request builder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/filerequest/123`
the `file_request_id` is `123`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
